pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, August 31, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Oshawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour the University of Ontario Institute of Technology, Automotive Centre of Excellence. Remarks and a media availability will follow. 

University of Ontario Institute of Technology, Automotive Centre of Excellence
2000 Simcoe Street North

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity of the tour
    • Open coverage of remarks and media availability
    • Media should arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.
